title: Card represents a rich preview card that is generated using OpenGraph tags from a URL.

author_name.description: The author of the original resource.

author_url.description: A link to the author of the original resource.

blurhash.description: A hash computed by the BlurHash algorithm, for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.

description.example: Is water wet? We're not sure. In this article, we ask an expert...

embed_url.description: Used for photo embeds, instead of custom html.

html.description: HTML to be used for generating the preview card.

provider_name.description: The provider of the original resource.

provider_url.description: A link to the provider of the original resource.

type.description: The type of the preview card.
